Moo's Mythic Framework Settings and Controls Moo's Mythic Framework Settings Deletes all saved mythic items. Clear Saved Mythic Items Notify player when mythic item is created. Print Extra Startup Logs Allow Mythic Item Saving. Allow Mythic Item Spawning. Max Mythic Items Produced Per Colony: Max Saved Mythic Items Minimum level for skill-based mythic items. Upon leveling up a skill, the mod will try to create a mythic item if the new level is at least this value. Only creates an item once per skill per pawn. Mythic Item Occurrence Limit: This value controls how many times a mythic item can show up in any capacity (as a quest reward, as a random shop item, etc) before it is removed from the saved list of mythic items. If set to 0, then mythic items won't be removed unless the total mythic item save limit is reached, in which case the oldest items are removed first.
